companyInfo.Competitors: WinterWyman, Beacon Hill Staffing Group, Hollister Staffing

jobDescription: My client is a leading data driven/data analytics company with great company culture, compensation and benefits. Join the data science team and:Experiment and analyze data with statistical and data mining tools to provide insight to company and customers (SaaS).Implement ML algorithms using Big Data technologies.Present findings to team and to customers.You have:2-5+ years experience.Strong Python and tools experience (Pandas, keras, etc.).Strong SQL, Linux Command Line.Exposure to Spark/Hive.Understanding of statistics and ML.
